/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of the sun, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on one side and trees on the other. The buildings, painted in hues of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, with their lush green foliage, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape.

A white car is seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The perspective of the image is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and distance. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.

The image is a blend of urban and natural elements, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of man-made structures and nature in Beijing. It's a snapshot of everyday life in this bustling city, captured in a moment of tranquility.
